title: Access to a Poolside Oasis w/ a Waterfall w/These 1, 2, & 3BR Apts.!
map_address: 9999 W Katie Ave near W Twain and Eula
posting_body: ['Luxury, Convenience, and Peace of Mind', 'CALL:', 'show contact info', 'x302', 'Please Call', '.', '3 Bed 2 Bath .', '1310 Sq.Ft', 'Resort at the Lakes', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Address:', '9999 W Katie Ave Las Vegas, NV 89147', 'Want more information?', '<URL>', 'DESCRIPTION', 'Find your next home in this expansive three-bedroom, two-bathroom layout from the Resort at the Lakes.', 'The interiors stun with vaulted ceilings, wood-style flooring, and large windows.', 'Take note of modern conveniences like a washer and dryer set and a crackling fireplace.', 'Within the community, you can mingle with neighbors by the freeform pool or in the luxurious resident clubhouse.', 'Call today to learn more!', 'FLOORPLAN/UNIT\u2002 \u2002FEATURES', 'Full Size Washer/Dryer in Unit', 'Garage', 'Gas Fireplaces in Select Units', 'Range', 'Pantry', 'Microwave', 'Dishwasher', 'Refrigerator', 'Ceiling Fan', 'Large Closets', 'Breakfast Bar', 'Air Conditioning', 'Vaulted Ceiling', 'Window Coverings', 'LEASE\u2002\u2002TERMS', '6,7,8,9,10,11,12', 'Online Leasing URL:', '<URL>', 'OFFICE\u2002 \u2002HOURS', 'Monday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Tuesday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Wednesday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Thursday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Friday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Saturday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Sunday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'x302', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
